vote.text: Amendment SA 3321 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3321 proposed by Senator Brown OH for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S674; text: CR S674) To amend the resolving clause.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3321 proposed by Senator Brown OH for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3321 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
